name: Sparrowsdk
body:
Facebook Python SDK

This client library is designed to support the [Sparrow sms Api](api.sparrowsms.com) and the official [SparrowSmsSDK](https://github.com/bant4u/SparrowSDK/), which is the canonical way to implement Sparrow sms Outgoing api. You can read more about the API by accessing its official documentation.

Basic usage:

import sparrow
out = sparrow.OutgoingAPI('client_id','username','password','url')
out.sendsms('from','to','message')

Having trouble with Pages?  weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
